definitions.title: vb. Pa‘l.
definitions.body: (Ges:§ 55d) be at ease or at peace, rest securely (Syr. 4ayen pacify, 4ayno0 Eth.san0: peace);—Pf. 3 ms. [[שַׁאֲנַן]] Je 48:11, ´[[וְשׁ]]: consec. Je 30:10 +; 3 pl. [[שַׁאֲנׇָנוּ]] Job 3:18;—be at ease, secure, undisturbed by ill fortune: ´[[וְשָׁקַט וְשׁ]]: [[וְאֵין מַחֲרִיד]] Je 30:10 = Je 46:27; Je 48:11 (of Moab); [[מִפַּחַד רָעָה]] ´[[שׁ]]: Pr 1:33; of rest from trouble, etc., in grave Job 3:18.
